objects.text: • PREMIUM LUXURY FRAGRANCE • LONG-LASTING SCENT • SIGNATURE BLEND

product_details.name: Dior Sauvage EDP - The Epitome of Masculine Elegance
product_details.description:
• Authentic Dior Sauvage Eau de Parfum - Premium Luxury Fragrance
• Long-lasting, sophisticated scent with powerful sillage
• Signature blend of fresh bergamot, warm amber, and vanilla notes
• Elegant dark bottle design with distinctive Dior branding
• Perfect for confident, modern gentlemen
• Superior concentration compared to EDT version
• Ideal for both day and evening wear
• Comes in a luxurious black glass bottle with magnetic cap
• Made in France - Guaranteed authentic Dior product
• Versatile fragrance suitable for all seasons

banner_details:
This banner showcases a sleek and modern design for a premium men's fragrance. The background features a smooth radial gradient invoking mystery and sophistication, framed by dotted circles and thin outlined graphics that emphasize the product's luxurious appeal. At the center of the layout is the product image (`product_image`), highlighted by a faint glowing circle. The bold heading (`heading`) and tagline (`tagline`) establish masculine energy and elegance, using futuristic fonts. A price badge (`price`) appears within a soft glowing orb. Supporting text (`description`) provides highlights of the fragrance's qualities, and a prominent call-to-action button (`cta` and `cta_background`) encourages immediate purchase.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Teal: `#071A18`
- Midnight Green: `#0D2B28`
- Aqua Mint: `#06D6B9`
- Classic White: `#FFFFFF`
- Soft Teal Green: `#0D5C4F`
product_color: The product image for Dior Sauvage Eau de Parfum is sleek and impactful, dominated by deep tones and bold contrast. The primary color palette includes deep black (#000000), rich emerald green (#007A3D), and clean white (#FFFFFF). The bottle features a glossy black body that exudes elegance and authority, while the luminous green highlights run vertically, adding vibrancy and modern appeal. White typography pops sharply against the dark background, ensuring clarity and sophistication. The subtle gradient from dark green to black blends seamlessly, creating depth and visual intrigue. These colors together evoke luxury, mystique, and freshness—ideal for a high-end fragrance ad.
